This map is giant and very complex, to not get lost in the citadel, I am going to make a video for show which passages take to arrived at the end 
This map is based in the citadel of Half Life 2.
You have to escape of this citadel, infected by many zombies. The citadel is very complex, so it's very hard to escape. You have to use the Teamwork !
